'''Pocket-Sized Pine Cabin''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Pocket-Sized Pine Cabin is obtainable from the [[Adeptal Mirror]].

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Pine Wood = 12
|sort = Pine Wood
}}
